data.comment: The match is underway at An der alten Forsterei.
Free kick Union Berlin.
In the minute 1, Union Berlin are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Union Berlin awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Augsburg.
In the minute 6, Augsburg's Daniel Caligiuri gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Union Berlin defender.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 8, In Berlin Union Berlin drive forward through Marius Bulter. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Union Berlin.
Christopher Trimmel (Union Berlin) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 10, Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Berlin.
In the minute 13, Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Union Berlin's half?
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Augsburg at An der alten Forsterei.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Augsburg push upfield but Marco Fritz quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 19, Union Berlin are coming forward and Marcus Ingvartsen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Marco Fritz awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Marco Fritz signals a throw-in for Augsburg, close to Union Berlin's area.
In the minute 22, Grischa Promel (Union Berlin) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Union Berlin's half?
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
The match at An der alten Forsterei has been interrupted briefly for a check on Christian Gentner, who is down injured.
Goal kick for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
In the minute 25, Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Union Berlin in their own half.
Sebastian Griesbeck (Union Berlin) has replaced the possibly injured Christian Gentner.
In the minute 27, Union Berlin's Marcus Ingvartsen has run offside.
Union Berlin drive upfield and Sheraldo Becker gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Augsburg defender.
Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Union Berlin goal kick.
Marco Fritz signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 35, Marco Fritz awards Union Berlin a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Union Berlin in Berlin.
In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 37, Augsburg needs to be cautious. Union Berlin have an attacking throw-in.
Union Berlin drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Florian Niederlechner (Augsburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 40, Goal! Augsburg take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Ruben Vargas.
Raphael Framberger with an assist there.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 43, Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Union Berlin awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Augsburg.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Felix Ohis Uduokhai of Augsburg smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Marco Fritz blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 46, Jeffrey Gouweleeuw is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Marius Bulter of Union Berlin gets in a strike, but is off target.
Augsburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Jeffrey Gouweleeuw is back on the pitch.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, In Berlin a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Union Berlin have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
Important block from the Augsburg defence as Robert Andrich fires in a strike for Union Berlin.
In the minute 55, Christopher Trimmel for Union Berlin is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Union Berlin at An der alten Forsterei.
Ball safe as Union Berlin is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 59, Union Berlin have a dangerous throw-in.
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Union Berlin.
In the minute 61, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Union Berlin territory.
Throw-in Union Berlin.
Marco Fritz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
Union Berlin's Sebastian Griesbeck has been booked in Berlin.
Marco Fritz signals a free kick to Union Berlin in their own half.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Augsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at An der alten Forsterei.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Augsburg needs to be cautious. Union Berlin have an attacking throw-in.
Marco Fritz signals a throw-in for Union Berlin, close to Augsburg's area.
Marco Fritz signals a Union Berlin throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Christopher Lenz (Union Berlin) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Union Berlin to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Union Berlin.
Free kick for Augsburg in the half of Union Berlin.
The home team have replaced Grischa Promel with Cedric Teuchert. This is the second substitution made today by Urs Fischer.
In the minute 71, Union Berlin make their third substitution with Max Kruse replacing Sheraldo Becker.
Throw-in for Union Berlin in their own half.
Throw-in Augsburg.
In the minute 74, Can Union Berlin get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
Goal! Marius Bulter levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Christopher Lenz to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Marco Fritz.
